alert.note: Alert for Redwood; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 9:31PM CDT until June 02 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River at Savage affecting Dakota, Carver, Scott and Hennepin Counties. ...Forecast flooding changed to Minor severity for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River at Montevideo affecting Lac qui Parle, Chippewa and Yellow Medicine Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River At Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. .River levels will slowly fall back through the weekend and into next week. Chances for thunderstorms during the same time frame could cause local rises, however widespread rainfall is not anticipated at this time. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River At Morton. * WHEN...Until Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Riverside Rd and Front Street flooded in North Redwood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 830 PM CDT Thursday, the stage was 22.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 830 PM CDT Thursday was 22.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.4 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.2 feet on 05/02/2006. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
